column4: firefox keeps crashing my os. i have 4 gb of memory. when it crashes, the system cannot detect a hard drive and you have to manually cold boot & then it is fine. i will paste the error messages (which i had to copy by hand) if you send me that url for pasting.
thanks again to those of you provinding support
my version of firefox is whatever is in the ubuntu repositories
Use chromium. Firefox is bloated. ;<   But don't let that stop you.
